message: I propose dividing the money 75/25, with me receiving 75 dollars. I believe this is a fair offer considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think 60/40 is a more reasonable split, considering the inflation will hit me harder. I'm willing to take a larger share now to minimize the impact later.
Considering the inflation rates and previous offers, I propose a 60/40 split. This balances our shares while accounting for the diminishing value of money in future rounds.
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving you a free pass on the inflation advantage. I think 50/50 is the fairest split now.
